content.text: I'm doing well. I'm a big fan of sitcoms and I would love to have a home with a big yard for my dogs.
That sounds nice! I'm a wedding planner, and my passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day will not let me give up hope even in the most difficult of situations.
That's so cool! I love watching wedding planning shows. What's your favorite part of the job?
My favorite part of the job is seeing the couple's faces when they see their wedding come together. It's so rewarding to be a part of that special day.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it must be so rewarding.
It is! It's also a lot of fun to work with couples who are so excited to start their new lives together.
That's wonderful! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do! What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer. I like to code and I'm always learning new things.
That sounds like a fun job! I'm not very tech-savvy, but I'm always impressed by what software engineers can do.
Thanks! It can be challenging, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine! What's your favorite thing about being a software engineer?
I like being able to create something new and seeing it come to life. It's also really cool to be able to work on projects that people will actually use
